DOC.brief_summary: Study design : This 2-phase study . During first phase , investigator develop contraceptive counseling intervention base principle Motivational Interviewing , train counselor , conduct small pilot study develop skill refine intervention . The second phase feasibility randomize control trial ( RCT ) compare outcome : Group 1 - Women randomize 20-40 minute contraceptive counseling session base principle motivational interviewing , vs. Group 2 - Women receive usual clinic care . Population : Women , age 15-29 year , present University Chicago family plan clinic termination unintended pregnancy . Hypothesis : A large proportion woman randomize receive MI counsel intervention use effective contraception 3 month intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Use Motivational Interviewing Increase Contraception Use Among Young Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 1529 year 2 . Presenting elective termination unintended pregnancy 3 . Has contraceptive counseling team . 4 . Willing able understand comply study protocol 5 . Willing able sign inform consent English 1 . Current pregnancy intend 2 . Current pregnancy desire 3 . Reason pregnancy termination elective ( e.g . fetal anomaly , pregnancy result rape incest ) 4 . Plans pregnancy within 6 month 5 . Has administer sedatives cervical ripen agent 6 . For minor , must ward state .
